name: Burning Out (itch) (BoN)
description:
C O N N E C T I O N E S T A B L I S H E D .

You've been contacted by... someone? Something? Find out what they want, and then... well, then something.
You'll figure it out, I'm sure.

Fullscreen strongly recommended.

This game is currently in active development- at the moment,  one ending is complete, but more are on their way. If you find any errors, please let me know here, so I can fix them. Anyone who finds an error will be credited in the game, unless you ask me not to do so.

This game has been submitted to the 2022 Game Development World Championship. Consider giving it a vote, if you think it deserves one- No registration required. Or if you don't want to vote on an incomplete game, maybe come back around January when the game's closer to done, and vote then? Either way, I'll certainly appreciate it!
